main event: An unusual aerial phenomenon was observed hovering near Cochise, New Mexico on February 23, 1955.
interesting points: The object was reported to be bright reddish in color,It hovered for about 10 to 15 minutes before disappearing,Witnesses described the object as glowing and emitting smoke or fumes,The object appeared to be about 30 feet in diameter,The sighting involved multiple witnesses including military personnel.
witness description: a call from two men who observed the object
